ygData.messageBody:
The level 24 song is ultravision/see invis. This song was relatively but not entirely useless until
Verant modified level 19 to be not just invis but invis/see invis. At which point, they never bothered to
address the fact that this made level 24 pointless. So looking at the weakness of 24 to justify the
weakness of DDD isn't a good comparison. Particularly since Verant just explicitly modified DDD to make
it "good" in their way of thinking.

Also, Verant has never in any way indicated that DDD was tuned with PvP in mind. In general, their
approach is to make songs/spells work differently on blue and red servers in order to balance for PvP. In
the absence of any other information, I am forced to assume that they believe that this song is balanced
for blue server play. I couldn't disagree with them more.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk
